MASSAlign Documentation¶

This is MASSAlign’s documentation page! MASSAlign has two main functionalities:

  • Aligning paragraphs and sentences of comparable documents.
  • Annotating parallel sentences at word level.

Here's the documentation content:

  • Input
    • Documents
    • Word Alignments
    • Constituency Parses
  • Modules
    • massalign.aligners
    • massalign.annotators
    • massalign.core
    • massalign.gui
    • massalign.models
    • massalign.util
  • Examples
    • Extracting and Visualizing Paragraph Alignments
    • Extracting and Visualizing Sentence Alignments
    • Extracting and Visualizing Word-Level Annotations for Sentences
